title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When performing the following steps:
1. Open the scripted resource editor example
2. Create a new basic project
3. Create a new file named 'test.xml'
4. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'
5. Right-click and choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'
6. The expected behavior is that a new editor should open for the file 'test.xml', as the editor type is different.

However, the observed behavior is that nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example is reactivated, disregarding the XML file content.
EB: When performing the steps mentioned above, selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' should open a new editor for the file 'test.xml', taking into consideration its different editor type.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the scripted resource editor example
2. Create a new basic project
3. Create a new file named 'test.xml'
4. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'
5. Right-click and choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'
